scripts.test-local: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha -r esm --preserve-symlinks -t 30000 -A -R ${REPORTER:-spec} --require tests/test-mocha.js tests/10-RsvpClientLocal.spec.js
scripts.test-localhost: cross-env NODE_ENV=test RSVP_HOST=localhost RSVP_PORT=38443 mocha -r esm --preserve-symlinks -t 30000 -A -R ${REPORTER:-spec} --require tests/test-mocha.js tests/20-RsvpClient-Localhost-Staging.spec.js
scripts.test-watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha -r esm --watch --preserve-symlinks -t 30000 -A -R ${REPORTER:-spec} --require tests/test-mocha.js tests/*.spec.js
scripts.coverage: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text-summary npm run test-node
scripts.coverage-ci: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=lcovonly npm run test-node
